data.name: ASTRONEER (Original Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack to ASTRONEER, including over 44 tracks, all encoded as 320kbps MP3.

The soundtrack is over an hour of original music composed specifically for the game by Dutch artist Rutger Zuydervelt (Machinefabriek).

Track List:

Volume 1:

Main Menu (3:16)
Gameplay 1 (2:00)
Gameplay 2 (2:45)
Danger 1 (2:44)
Danger 2 (3:09)
Exploration 1 (2:24)
Exploration 2 (2:34)
Exploration 3 (2:18)
Stinger (0:18)
Gathering 1 (2:57)
Gathering 2 (2:10)
Gathering 3 (3:15)
Building (3:01)
Gameplay 3 (3:08)
Gameplay 4 (1:52)
Gameplay 5 (3:46)
Trailer Track (1:15)
Exploration 4 (2:24)
Exploration 5 (2:31)
Exploration 6 (2:48)
Gameplay 6 (1:30)
Gameplay 7 (1:53)
Mineral Music (2:38)
Gathering 4 (2:31)
Gathering 5 (2:48)
Starting Scene (6:02)

Volume 2:

Cave 1 (1:43)
Gathering 6 (3:01)
Gathering 7 (3:16)
Cave 2 (3:00)
Danger 3 (3:21)
Danger 4 (2:50)
Cave 3 (2:14)
Gathering 8 (2:41)
Gathering 9 (2:26)
Cave 4 (1:51)

Exploration 7 (2:35)
Exploration 8 (2:11)
Exploration 9 (3:23)
Cave 6 (2:31)
Gameplay 8 (2:35)
Gameplay 9 (3:28)
Solar Score (5:36)

data.short_description: The soundtrack is over an hour of original music composed specifically for the game by Dutch artist Rutger Zuydervelt (Machinefabriek).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Something manufactured after 1994 or so.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: The vivid colours in your mind
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Don't sweat it, it's music.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Whichever brings you the most joy or least rage.
  • Processor: The one you run ASTRONEER with!
  • Memory: 227 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Having synesthesia might spice things up.
  • Storage: 915 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Whatever sounds best to your ears.
  • Additional Notes: Still just music. You don't need to be checking your 3DMark score.
